comments.content: I've sent a code review off for this. The underlying problem is that this method isn't covered by unit testing. I'm going to leave this bug open until that is done as well.

comments.content: The underlying problem is resolved. I have a queue of four patches which drive the unit test coverage for this module to 100%, which I will send off once code reviewers are available again.

comments.content: Ok. Unit test is now 100% for this code.
